title: Do This Before You Quit
itunes:title: Do This Before You Quit
description:
Most of us don't understand the real reason we quit diets. This is important to understand if you've ever thought...

 

"I'm afraid that if I lose my weight, I'll just gain it back."

"When I start getting comments, I start eating again."

Or "I'm not sure I can even lose weight."

 

If any of this sounds familiar, you're normal.

We often quit simply because we are afraid of something.

Before you quit anything, you can use a simple process to figure out what you're afraid of.

Sometimes quitting is the right answer, but you'll never know unless you listen to today's podcast.


Get the Free Course here:
http://NoBSFreeCourse.com
